name: Ode to Law
simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. After using on Cerydra, increases the CRIT DMG of the character with "Military Merit." After Coup de Main ends, Cerydra immediately gains Charge.
desc: Effective for the entire battle. After using on Cerydra, increases the CRIT DMG of the character with "Military Merit" by #1[i]%. After Coup de Main ends, Cerydra immediately gains #2[i] Charge.
